item.title: CVE-2022-29439|2024-09-16T18:17:57.264Z -- nextcode -- image%20slider%20by%20nextcode%20%E2%80%93%20photo%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Image Slider by NextCode plugin <= 1.1.2 at WordPress allows deleting slides.
